Pre-Game Insights: Western Conference foes Golden State and Los Angeles square off on Sunday.
Golden State finished 46-36 overall and 26-26 in Western Conference action last season.
The Warriors allowed opponents to score 115.2 points per game and shoot 46.6% from the field last season.
Los Angeles finished 51-31 overall and 9-7 in Pacific Division play during the 2023-24 season.
The Clippers averaged 115.6 points per game last season, 18.3 on free throws and 37.8 from beyond the arc.
Clippers' Mo Bamba and Kawhi Leonard are out due to knee injuries.
